About

Film production company set up by casting directors' Des Hamilton and Lara Manwaring

Pianos

A light hearted documentary looking at the members of the public that stop to play the public pianos in St Pancras Station

Champions

Inner city kids drive home the sentiment of one of Muhammad Ali's greatest quotes.

Budapest

Seeking silence from a recent heartbreak girls submerge themselves in their baths

Behind the Door

Desire for revenge leads to total Obsession

Arnica

A young mans love letter to his dead father
